subject: Delegation of Powers relating to various issues under Commercial operation
text: 91aly 7cly  TTHTf   qrfeta7ut TAn Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 4t ({g7 9a67 3 TTHTT HFTT4) 4 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 #I National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) d-5 & 6, #42 7-10, ERFT, Tf fcri)-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No. 11041/217/2007-Admn 13th December, 2012 POLICY MATTERS-ADMINISTRATION/FINANCE (101/2012) (Decision Taken on File No. NHAI/CM/Elect/TollPlaza/2008) Sub: Delegation of Powers relating to varlous issues under Commercial Operations. In partial modification of Policy Circular dated 03.08.2012 [Administration/Finance No. 89/2012], the following further Delegation of Power has been decided by Chairman in case of the issues under Commercial Operations: (i The proposals of C.O. Division for amendments to "Standard RFP" shall be examined by 3 CGMs   Committee [Two CGM(T) & CGMICO)] and finalized  for incorporation in the Standard RFP after approval of concerned Member: (ii) Annual Potential Collection (APC) for bid purposes shall be approved by Member APC Committee comprising of [CGM(F), CGM(CO), GMCO) concerned and GM(T) of concerned State]: (iii) In case of non-receipt of bids in regular bidding and other such exigencies, limited bidding needs to be resorted to for & short period toll collection: The highest bid for award under such limited bidding shall be approved/ rejected by concerned Member. (iv) Opening and acceptance of single bid under regular bidding: decision to open the single bid received or t0 re-invite the bid shall be taken by concerned Member. However, Chairman will decide on the acceptance of single bid received and opened; (v) Imposition of penalty on the tolling contractors for various defaults of the Contractor: (a) PD (of DGM & above) upto 07 days remittance value. (b) CGM/RO upto one month remittance value. (c) Member concerned upto two months remittance value (d) Chairman Full Powers. (vi) Claims under Force Majeure: (a) CGM/RO upto one month remittance value. b) Member concerned upto two months remittance value. (c Chairman Full Powers. (vii) Maintenance, invocation & release of Performance Security: Demand Drafts (Ihe amount to be transferred to NHAI HQ to bank account of RO) and Bank Guarantees of Performance Security shall be maintained at Regional Oftice.
